ygData.subject: Re: You want to know how weak warriors! Listen to t his!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with Mr. twinker here (ahem .. I twink to just not so excessively :).  Warriors are equipment dependent the better the equipment the more
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with Mr. twinker here (ahem .. I twink to just not so
excessively :). Warriors are equipment dependent the better the equipment
the more effective the warrior is.

All you high level warriors start a new character twink them to hell and
back (give them full plate, hell banded will do until about 15) and all the
best magic items you can (especially str increasing stuff). You will be
able to solo EASILY minimum, to level 15. With plate Im sure it will be
higher (I stopped my experiment at level 15). I hit level 15 in less then 2
days, I solo'd yellows consistently as well as the odd light red. Warriors
are strong but they NEED equipment.

> ----------
> From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> >
> > I can kill steall from a lvl 18-20 wiizie and I'm only lvl 15, why couse
> I

> >

> you'll
> > see!
> >

> > ----Original Message Follows----

> btw

> > was using a zweildahander.... This was the most embarassing thing that
